Matthew Ashford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matthew_Ashford 0 Matthew Nile Ashford (born January 29, 1960) is an American actor best known for the role of Jack Deveraux on the NBC soap opera Days of Our Lives. Matthew_Nile_Ashford ( born January_29_,_1960 ) is an_American_actor best_known for the_role of Jack_Deveraux on the_NBC_soap_opera_Days of Our_Lives .
